directions: Place alternating slices of tomatoes, zucchini and onion on serving platter. Sprinkle with herbs. Whisk together oil and vinegar and pour over salad. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 and up to 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried, crumbled
1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano or 1 teaspoon dried, crumbled
3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar or 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
title: Tomato, Onion and Zucchini Salad
